description:
* Course Went Live: May 2016 *

* Full Apps and Cheat Sheets are included *

-------

Before you read what I have to say, see what my students are saying about my courses:

"What an incredible value and learning experience!" by Sean A.

-------

Are you a network professional who wants to start automating network tasks using Python and manage network devices from various vendors?

Are you looking to become a better network engineer and start learning Python Network Programming?

Or maybe you're seeking a raise or even a career change?

Do you want to easily manage your network devices via SNMP, using the amazing power of the Python programming language?

Join thousands of successful students who have decided to upgrade their networking skills and boost their careers using this Python Network Programming course series!

-------
  • Thousands of satisfied students are enrolled in my Python Network Programming Courses across the Web.
  • Last week over 300 students have joined my Python courses.
  • The average rating is above 4.8 / 5 from hundreds of reviews.
-------

This course covers multiple networking vendors:

  • Cisco IOS
  • Juniper JunOS
  • Arista EOS
  • HP ProCurve OS
-------

Save Time and Money by Writing Your Own Python Programs to Automate Daily Network Tasks. Grow Your Networking Career With Python Network Programming Skills! 

Bonus, You Might Even Get a Raise or a Better Job with These New Skills!


This Python Network Programming course is aimed at network professionals having little or no experience in network automation and a great desire to use Python and a smart Python module to automate their SNMP tasks.

You will easily start working with Python and SNMP and perform SNMP GET, SET, SET multiple OIDs, WALK, GET-NEXT, GET-BULK operations on Cisco, Juniper, Arista and HP network devices, using only a few lines of Python code.

-------

Let me describe a few more features of this course:

  • An amazing optimized Linux Ubuntu VM, with all the tools, Python modules and dependencies already installed and all the Python scripts ready to be executed on the devices in your network.
  • Command cheat sheets with all the essential commands and lines of code in each section.
  • 1080p, Full HD videos. Improved audio quality.
  • 20+ lectures and counting. 1+ hours of content.
  • Concise and focused lectures.
-------

Important information before you enroll:

  • Once enrolled, you have unlimited, lifetime access to the course!
  • You will have instant and free access to any updates I'll add to the course!
  • A Certificate of Course Completion is issued by Udemy at the end of the course!
-------

So, what are you waiting for? Do you want to be a better network engineer and also become a network programmer, using Python? Do you still want to catch the network programming and automation career train? Now is the perfect time to make your first step! 


Enroll in this course and see the benefits for your career, as thousands of other students did using my courses! See you inside!
title: Python Network Programming - Python and SNMP
